content: The msgFilterRules.dat file can be copied between accounts on the same or different computers. It's located in the account subfolder of Mail or ImapMail in the profile folder, e.g. ImapMail/imap.gmail.com. Copy the file with TB closed.
creator: sfhowes

content:
The link is deactivated by design to allow editing by clicking in the link text. Save the message as a draft to test links.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/hyperlinks-in-messages-not-working#w_problems-with-composing-messages
creator: sfhowes
